ne8:1.4: Ye dhammā ekalakkhaṇā, tesaṁ dhammānaṁ ekasmiṁ dhamme vutte avasiṭṭhā dhammā vuttā bhavanti.
ne8:2.1: “Cakkhuṁ, bhikkhave, anavaṭṭhitaṁ ittaraṁ parittaṁ pabhaṅgu parato dukkhaṁ byasanaṁ calanaṁ kukkuḷaṁ saṅkhāraṁ vadhakaṁ amittamajjhe”.
ne8:2.2: Imasmiṁ cakkhusmiṁ vutte avasiṭṭhāni ajjhattikāni āyatanāni vuttāni bhavanti.
ne8:2.4: Sabbāni hi cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni vadhakaṭṭhena ekalakkhaṇāni.
ne8:3.1: “Atīte, rādha, rūpe anapekkho hohi, anāgataṁ rūpaṁ mā abhinandi, paccuppannassa rūpassa nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya cāgāya paṭinissaggāya paṭipajja”.
ne8:3.2: Imasmiṁ rūpakkhandhe vutte avasiṭṭhā khandhā vuttā bhavanti.
ne8:3.4: Sabbe hi pañcakkhandhā yamakovādasutte vadhakaṭṭhena ekalakkhaṇā vuttā.
ne8:5.1: Iti kāyagatāya satiyā vuttāya vuttā bhavanti vedanāgatā sati cittagatā dhammagatā ca.
ne8:5.2: Tathā yaṁ kiñci diṭṭhaṁ vā sutaṁ vā mutaṁ vāti vutte vuttaṁ bhavati viññātaṁ.
ne8:6.1: “Tasmātiha tvaṁ bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ”.
ne8:6.2_1: loke abhijjhādomanassan”ti samādhindriyaṁ, evaṁ kāye kāyānupassino viharato cattāro
ne8:7.1_0: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro sammappadhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti,
ne8:7.1_1: catūsu sammappadhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro iddhipādā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti,
ne8:7.1_2: catūsu iddhipādesu bhāviyamānesu pañcindriyāni bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti, pañcasu
ne8:7.1_3: indriyesu bhāviyamānesu pañca balāni bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti, pañcasu balesu bhāviyamānesu
ne8:7.1_4: satta bojjhaṅgā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti, sattasu bojjhaṅgesu bhāviyamānesu ariyo
ne8:7.1_5: aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati, sabbeva bodhaṅgamā dhammā bodhipakkhiyā
ne8:7.2: Kena kāraṇena, sabbe hi bodhaṅgamā bodhipakkhiyā neyyānikalakkhaṇena ekalakkhaṇā, te ekalakkhaṇattā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti.
ne8:8.1: Evaṁ akusalāpi dhammā ekalakkhaṇattā pahānaṁ abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
ne8:8.2_0: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu vipallāsā pahīyanti, āhārā cassa pariññaṁ gacchanti,
ne8:8.2_1: upādānehi anupādāno bhavati, yogehi ca visaṁyutto bhavati, ganthehi ca vippayutto
ne8:8.2_2: bhavati, āsavehi ca anāsavo bhavati, oghehi ca nitthiṇṇo bhavati, sallehi ca visallo
ne8:8.2_3: bhavati, viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo cassa pariññaṁ gacchanti, agatigamanehi na agatiṁ gacchati,
ne8:8.2_4: evaṁ akusalāpi dhammā ekalakkhaṇattā pahānaṁ abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
ne8:9.1: Yattha vā pana rūpindriyaṁ desitaṁ, desitā tattheva rūpadhātu rūpakkhandho rūpañcāyatanaṁ.
ne8:9.2: Yattha vā pana sukhā vedanā desitā, desitaṁ tattha sukhindriyaṁ somanassindriyaṁ dukkhasamudayo ca ariyasaccaṁ.
ne8:9.3: Yattha vā pana dukkhā vedanā desitā, desitaṁ tattha dukkhindriyaṁ domanassindriyaṁ dukkhañca ariyasaccaṁ.
ne8:9.4: Yattha vā pana adukkhamasukhā vedanā desitā, desitaṁ tattha upekkhindriyaṁ sabbo ca paṭiccasamuppādo.
ne8:9.5: Kena kāraṇena, adukkhamasukhāya hi vedanāya avijjā anuseti.
ne8:9.6_0: Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṁ, nāmarūpapaccayā
ne8:9.6_1: saḷāyatanaṁ, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā,
ne8:9.6_2: taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṁ, upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṁ
ne8:9.6_3: sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavanti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
ne8:9.7: So ca sarāgasadosasamohasaṅkilesapakkhena hātabbo, vītarāgavītadosavītamohaariyadhammehi hātabbo.
ne8:10.1: Evaṁ ye dhammā ekalakkhaṇā kiccato ca lakkhaṇato ca sāmaññato ca cutūpapātato ca, tesaṁ dhammānaṁ ekasmiṁ dhamme vutte avasiṭṭhā dhammā vuttā bhavanti.
